settings.title:
Curl Care
That's Good 4U
and the Planet
settings.description:
Our natural hair care line is science-backed,
nature-made, and totally clean for your
curls, health, and the environment.

settings.title:
Curl Care That’s Good
4U and the Planet
settings.text:
Our natural hair care line is science-backed,
nature-made, and totally clean for your curls, health, and the environment.

settings.title: Simple. Safe. Sustainable. <br class="hide-mobile">
settings.text: Our mission is to develop products that are good for you and good for the planet. We teamed up with the world’s leading clean scientist and formulators to push our products to do the most with the fewest possible ingredients. The result, high performance, biodegradable formulas crafted with sustainable ingredients.

settings.title: Simple. Safe. Sustainable. <br class="hide-mobile">
settings.text: Our mission is to develop products that are good for you and good for the planet. We teamed up with the world’s leading clean scientist and formulators to push our products to do the most with the fewest possible ingredients. The result, high performance, biodegradable formulas crafted with sustainable ingredients.

settings.title:
Science Backed,
Nature Made,
Totally Clean
settings.text: Our products are formulated with the cleanest ingredients for textured curls. Every product features our patented, award-winning ingredient, Hemi15, combined with other curl-friendly ingredients to give you your healthiest, shiniest, most defined curls.

settings.title: HEMI15
settings.subtitle: Deeply nourishes and<br class="hide-mobile"> moisturizes hair from root to tip after just one use.

settings.title: WATERMELON EXTRACT
settings.subtitle:
Minerals and vitamins
(A, C, B complex)
deeply hydrate and
soften hair.

settings.title: HIBISCUS OIL
settings.subtitle: Rich in essential fatty <br class="hide-mobile">acids, strengthens hair and boosts moisture.

settings.title: APPLE CIDER VINEGAR
settings.subtitle:
Acetic acid and
polyphonic compounds
balance pH, and clarifies.

settings.title: SEA MOSS EXTRACT
settings.text: Rich in proteins and minerals, adds shine and fortifies strands for added strengthens against breakage.

settings.title: FLAXSEED OIL
settings.text:
Omega-3 fatty acids can help strengthen hair & reduce
hair breakage.

settings.title: APPLE FRUIT EXTRACT
settings.text: Magnesium, potassium, and copper hydrate and soften.

settings.title: ALOE VERA
settings.text:
Strengthens and conditions, promoting healthier
looking shiny hair.

settings.title: VITAMIN E
settings.text: Reduces oxidative stress for healthier looking strands.

settings.title: ACAI OIL
settings.text: Coats hair in antioxidants to smooth and protect.

settings.title: ROSEMARY
settings.text: Calms and conditions

settings.title: ALOE LEAF JUICE
settings.text:
Strengthens strands while
deeply hydrating

settings.title: CASSIA SEED
settings.text:
Creates a flexible film on hair
fiber for defined
curls that last.

settings.title: CHIA SEED
settings.text:
Strengthens hair root
to stimulate growth and
thicken strands.

settings.heading: Tia’s Favorites
settings.content: The products Tia Mowry—and her family—can’t live without. Shop the shampoos and stylers that deliver her signature curls.

settings.title: “Love this conditioner ...surpassed my expectations! <br class="hide-mobile">My curls feel so smooth and soft.”
